works.description: Designed and semantically hand coded from scratch using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, and javaScript on a bootstrap framework. To dynamically render the portfolio cards, I ping an API that I built on firebase. The images are coming from my image dump on Parse. I also take advantage of SVG vector images and animation. It is fully responsive and supports all major browsers.
works.name: Portfolio
